dcterms:description: A large-scale argument mining dataset in Chinese, annotated on component level according to the claim-premise scheme, created from hotel reviews.

dcterms:description: A dataset of persuasive essays written by students, annotated for argumentation structures, which has been translated into multiple languages for cross-lingual experiments.
dcterms:title: A Large-Scale Parallel Dataset of Persuasive Essays (PE)
